page.title: 03FECKENHAM COFE FIRST SCHOOL
page.content:
Feckenham C of E First School is over 130 years old. There are two classrooms, a staffroom, an office, a hall and a kitchen. There are 35 children in the school divided between the two teachers into two classes,5 to 7 year olds and 7 to 9 year olds.There is also a part time secretary, and a part time ancillary helper. There is no caretaker but there is a cleaner in charge.
The school dinners are cooked by parent volunteers on a rota system. Every Monday morning the whole school goes on the coach to Redditch to the swimming baths.
The school is set in its own beautiful grounds quite a long way out of the village of Feckenham.
